msContents.summary: Manuscript for use during Śaiva initiation (dīkṣitạ̄) rites of transformation (maṅgala) and worship (pūjā), containing a series of Sanskrit mantras for recitation.

msItem.title: Maṅgalaprokta
मङ्गलप्रोक्त
msItem.colophon: Colophon: iti śrīrudrayāmale maṃgalaproktaṃ maṃgalapoktaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ // yādṛśaṃ pustakaṃ dṛṣtvā tadṛśaṃ likhi[taṃ] mayā // yadi ṣudham aṣudhaṃ vā mama doṣo na dīyate 1 // (f. 1v).

history.provenance: Manuscript was purchased and housed together with Item 443.
